thread.section_title: Bolt Depot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bolt Depot | www.boltdepot.com
thread.title: Felix Yen
thread.title_full: Bolt Depot reviewed by Felix Yen

author: Felix Yen
title: Felix Yen
text:
astonishing prices, impeccable packaging, and next-day shipment. but the washer dimensions do not include thickness and they seem a little thin (based on dimensions published elsewhere). after shortening the screw to accommodate, i discovered that it wouldn't hold ... the thin lock washer doesn't provide enough force.
tempted to say that the screw threads are smaller than the ones on the screw i wanted to replace, but i'm not sure ... the old one was installed with threadlocker.
fastener quality is high enough for *almost* any application, but i'd like to see more dimensional data on the website.
